scoringPlays.text: Chris Cunningham 8 Yd pass from Josh Jackson (Brian Johnson Kick)

videos.headline: Cavaliers air it out for 3rd down conversion
videos.description: On third-and-8, Virginia QB Kurt Benkert throws a strike over the middle and connects with Joe Reed for 23 yards and a first down.

videos.headline: Phillips makes tough catch in traffic to put Hokies in Cavaliers' territory
videos.description: On third-and-7, Josh Jackson lofts up a pass to Cam Phillips who reaches out and makes a contested grab for a 23-yard pickup, leading to a Virginia Tech field goal.

videos.headline: Virginia's Thornhill jumps route for INT
videos.description: Juan Thornhill cuts in front of a Virginia Tech receiver to pick off Josh Jackson's pass and record his fourth interception of the season.

videos.headline: Fuente: Offense needs to create 'chunk plays' in second half
videos.description: Virginia Tech coach Justin Fuente expects a close finish against rival Virginia, and says his team has to execute better on offense to come away with a win.

videos.headline: Cavaliers cough up the ball
videos.description: Virginia RB Chris Sharp has the ball jarred loose by Reggie Floyd and Virginia Tech's Houshun Gaines recovers to force the turnover.

videos.headline: Virginia Tech WR makes impressive leaping grab
videos.description: Hokie QB Josh Jackson goes deep and Houshun Grimsley goes up high and reaches back to make the catch for a 25-yard gain.

videos.headline: Hokies fool defense, score TD
videos.description: Virginia Tech QB Josh Jackson gets the Virginia defense to bite on play-action and finds Chris Cunningham open in the end zone for an eight-yard touchdown, giving the Hokies a 10-0 lead.

videos.headline: Jackson scrambles for Virginia Tech fourth-down conversion
videos.description: On fourth-and-1, Hokies QB Josh Jackson fakes a handoff and rushes right to pick up 19 yards and a first down.

videos.headline: Benkert completes leaping pass for long Virginia gain
videos.description: Virginia QB Kurt Benkert feels the pressure in the pocket and throws while jumping off his back leg to connect with Olamide Zaccheaus for a 28-yard pickup.

videos.headline: Cavaliers WR hauls in deep pass between two defenders
videos.description: Virginia QB Kurt Benkert airs it out and connects with Andre Levrone who makes the catch in traffic for a big 49-yard gain.

videos.headline: Virginia defender throws punch, gets ejected
videos.description: Cavaliers DE Andrew Brown gets thrown out of the game for throwing a punch after the play and subsequently pushing a referee.

videos.headline: Fuente: Defense was 'fantastic' in shutout win over Virginia
videos.description: Virginia Tech coach Justin Fuente lauded his team's defensive effort saying it was the primary reason for the Hokies' 10-0 win against the Cavaliers.
